mapper.select: SELECT tt.name trainName, tta.start_time startTime, tta.end_time endTime, tta.t_time totalTime, ttsa.`name` startStation, ttsb.name endStation FROM tule_train_arrange tta JOIN tule_train tt ON tt.id = tta.train_id JOIN tule_train_station ttsa ON tta.start_id = ttsa.id JOIN tule_train_station ttsb ON tta.end_id = ttsb.id WHERE tta.id = #{id,jdbcType = INTEGER}
SELECT `day`, train_arrange_id trainArrangeId, `explain`, id, end_day endDay FROM tule_train_date_arrange WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType = INTEGER}
SELECT id, name FROM tule_train WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, `explain` trip FROM tule_train_trip WHERE id = #{id}
